divs: Sighting DetailsI saw this ufo two nights on july 9th and 10th on a farm north of california mo.I went out side to watch fire-flies and saw this beautiful cross,it sort of danced? It was high in the sky and then would, move very fast almost instantly, but gracefully,come almost to the top of the trees. and then repeate the same pattern. I lost sight of the ufo ,when I went into the house to tell the other people to come out side to see the cross. It was a lovely sight and I knew it was a ufo because of the way it moved.
trends: There have been no other sightings in California
This sighting has never been favorited.
